description: Everu time there's a pending upgrade or reboot, It takes over priority on the screen, messing with any full screen application that is running

Completely confusing to use the 
word "UPGRADE" when I THINK,
this appn means it's an UPDATER.

UPGRADE has always meant "move
to the newest version of this distro"
while UPDATE means "update
individual code WITHIN the distro I 
chose".  I've always heard 
UPGRADING as something to avoid.

Please clarify in your next release.

pops up every now and then after reboot and you cannot remove the app
add a feature to remove or disable the popup
Should have some configuration at least. Delete...
